title: US, China Presidents Discuss Social Media App Deal, Plan In-Person Meeting
snippets: US and Chinese presidents discuss deal to keep popular social media app online in US, trade relations.
The president said he had a a "very productive" phone call with Chinese President Xi and would meet with him next month.
Second conversation between the two leaders since US president‚Äôs return to office
The leaders of the world‚Äôs two biggest economies will talk for the first time since June. The call could pave the way for an in-person meeting as soon as next month.
The call between the two leaders began around 8 a.m. Washington time, according to a White House official and China's Xinhua News Agency.
titles: LIVE: China‚Äôs Xi says talks with Trump ‚Äòpositive‚Äô
Trump admin live updates: Trump talks with Xi about trade, TikTok deal

Trump and China‚Äôs Xi set to discuss trade tensions, TikTok deal

summary: The US and Chinese presidents discussed a deal to keep a popular social media app operating in the US and trade relations during a "very productive" phone call. This marks their second conversation since the US president's return to office. They plan to meet in person next month, their first meeting since June. The call, which could lead to improved bilateral relations, started around 8 a.m. Washington time, as confirmed by both the White House and China's Xinhua News Agency.

title: British Couple Released from Detention in Afghanistan After 8 Months
snippets: UK thanks Qatar for leading negotiations for the release of the pair after their arrest in February.
Relatives of Peter Reynolds, 80, and his wife Barbara, 76, had made repeated pleas about their deteriorating health since their arrest in February.

Peter and Barbie Reynolds were arrested and held without charge for eight months, raising fears for their health

A British couple have been freed from months of detention in Afghanistan to the ‚Äúimmense joy‚Äù of their family.

The Taliban released Barbie Reynolds, 76, and her husband, Pe
Peter and Barbara Reynolds, 80 and 76, ran an education and training company in the country for years, and chose to remain after the Taliban took over in 2021.

summary: Peter and Barbara Reynolds, a British couple aged 80 and 76, were released from detention in Afghanistan after eight months. Their arrest in February had caused concern over their health. The UK acknowledged Qatar's role in negotiating their release. The couple, who ran an education and training company in Afghanistan and stayed after the Taliban's 2021 takeover, were freed to their family's immense joy.

title: NFL Admits Eagles' "Tush Push" False Start, Vows Stricter Enforcement

title: Noah Lyles Wins 200m World Title Again, Matches Usain Bolt's Record
snippets: Noah Lyles has defended his 200-meter world title for the third time, making him the second man, after Usain Bolt, to accomplish this achievement.

Noah Lyles pulled ahead of Kenny Bednarek heading into the straightaway then held him off down the stretch to capture his fourth title in a much-awaited 200 meters at world championships Friday night.
titles: Noah Lyles Storms To Win His Fourth World Title
Lyles wins his fourth 200-metre world title at world championships
summary: Noah Lyles successfully defended his 200-meter world title for the third consecutive time, becoming the second man after Usain Bolt to achieve this. In a highly anticipated race at the world championships, Lyles overtook Kenny Bednarek in the straightaway and maintained his lead to win his fourth title.

title: Astronomers Discover Rapidly Growing Black Hole with NASA's Chandra Observatory

This finding may shed light on how certain black holes achieve massive sizes shortly after the Big Bang. The black hole in question has a mass of about a billion times that of our sun.
